EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Day before reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal VIP Dinner is tomorrow 11/18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are sending you a friendly reminder that you are registered for The Pivotal VIP Dinner. The dinner will take place tomorrow Wednesday, November 18, 2015. Please see event details below
Date: November 18, 2015 Time: 7:00 PM - 9:30 PM Location: Pivotal <http://pivotal.io/locations/sanfrancisco>, 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor San Francisco, CA 94103
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
We look forward to seeing you, The Pivotal Team
